name: Mind Thrust V
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text: This functions as mind thrust IV, but the target is also exhausted for 1 round if it fails its save and fatigued for 1 round if it succeeds at its save. This spell can be undercast.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同心灵戳刺 IV（Mind Thrust IV）一般，不过当目标豁免失败时还会力竭（exhausted）1轮，即便目标豁免成功也会疲乏（fatigued）1轮。该法术可以被降阶施法。
